site_name: Land at Sandgate Close/ Crow Lane
decision_conditions: The non-material amendments accepted by this notice relate solely to conditions 20 of the decision under application reference P1152.18, dated 1st February 2019.  The revised wording of the condition is as set out below.  This is not a reissue of the original planning permission and the reminder of the original conditions will continue to apply. The two documents should be read together.
This decision supersedes the previously imposed condition 20 as follows:

At least 8 of the units hereby approved shall be constructed to comply with Part M4 (3)(2)(a) of the Building Regulations - Wheelchair Adaptable Dwellings. The remainder of the units and houses at ground floor level hereby approved shall be constructed to comply with Part M4 (2) of the Building Regulations - Accessible and Adaptable Dwellings and all other remaining units located on upper level shall be constructed to comply with Part M4 (1) of the Building Regulations - Accessible and Adaptable Dwelling.
Reason: In order to provide a suitable and reasonable number of accessible and adaptable dwellings in accordance with DC7 - Lifetime Homes and Mobility Housing of the Havering Core Strategy.
description:
Variation to Condition 20 - the condition states that the remaining units which are not complying with M4(3)(2)a of the Building Regulations must meet Part
M4(2) of the Building Regulations. This requires lift provision which was not provided for on the consented plans and cannot therefore be met. The units can
however meet M4(1) of the Building Regulations. The requested amendment would be for the units to provide the following compliance with Part M4 of the
Building Regulations:
-8 no. apartments to be M4 (3)
-Remaining ground floor units to be M4(2)
-Above ground floor apartments to be M4(1)
-Houses to be M4(2)
